code: function Api(){var api={baseUrl:'https://mesto.nomoreparties.co/v1/cohort-52',headers:{authorization:'1ce13fac-ab02-437f-bb39-64ceea4d3ebd','Content-Type':'application/json'}};var cards=function cards(){fetch("".concat(api.baseUrl,"/cards"),{headers:api.headers}).then(function(res){res.ok?res.json():Promise.reject("\u041E\u0448\u0438\u0431\u043A\u0430: ".concat(res.status));});};var user=function user(){fetch("".concat(api.baseUrl,"/users/me"),{headers:api.headers}).then(function(res){res.ok?res.json():Promise.reject("\u041E\u0448\u0438\u0431\u043A\u0430: ".concat(res.status));});};}export default Api;
